page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE ...
page.content:
{A day in the life of Mrs Stewart.
My friend Tracy and I intervewed a local lady Mrs Stewart.She told us that life is different now because she has alot more responsobilities and therefore feels a lot happier. Mrs Stewart says there is a lot more violence in the area now because of poverty and unemployment.She would rather live nowadays because there are things that are helpful in the house like washing machines and vacuum cleaners.She has lived in four houses altogether but prefers the one she lives in now because it is a nice size and has a lovely view.She likes Hightown because she was born here. Mrs Stewart would like to get free prescription because illness is expensive with three children.
